CARDINAL . ORG LAW DATE was enacted in order to implement the agricultural guidelines adopted by the PERSON in DATE and also to meet the policy goals of forestry and regional planning . Among the aims to be specially furthered by the LAW are the creation and preservation of viable family holdings so as to strengthen the connection between cultivation and ownership , and also the promotion of a continuous structural rationalisation of agriculture and forestry .

CARDINAL . ORG Under LAW , a permit is required for the acquisition of real estate assessed for tax purposes as an agricultural holding . Section CARDINAL lists a number of exceptions : for example , no permit is required when the property is acquired by a ORG authority other than a commercial undertaking ( sub - section CARDINAL ) or at a compulsory sale by auction ( sub - section CARDINAL ) other than such as take place in accordance with section CARDINAL of the Act ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) .

CARDINAL . ORG When deciding on an application for a permit , the authorities shall take into account that the setting up and development of rational enterprises in agriculture , forestry and horticulture should be promoted ( section CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL para . CARDINAL provides that a permit to acquire a property shall be refused , inter alia :
" CARDINAL . If the price or other consideration exceeds , to an extent which is not insignificant , the value of the property in view of its yield and other circumstances ,
CARDINAL . if it can be assumed that the acquisition is effected mainly as an investment ,

Paragraph CARDINAL of this section provides inter alia that sub - section CARDINAL of the first paragraph does not apply to the acquisition of real estate at a compulsory sale by auction under section CARDINAL of the Act ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) .
